objectives: Students will discuss daily routines and habits using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to daily routines and habits
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining daily routines and habits content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore daily routines and habits through a Romance lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving daily routines and habits

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to daily routines and habits in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about daily routines and habits using slang register
Students create original romance themed content about daily routines and habits in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe daily routines and habits in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in daily routines and habits?
Can you create a Romance story about daily routines and habits?
How does daily routines and habits change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving daily routines and habits
roles: Character A: Using slang register in romance context
Character B: Responding in slang register within romance theme

topic_genre_blend: daily routines and habits with heart
daily routines and habits with passion
daily routines and habits with affection

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
